comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Looks like Johnny (Jr.) and Mrs. Johnny (née Edythe Virginia Jones) eloped to Canada, at ages 17 and 19, respectively: The Pittsburgh Press, 25 February 1915: "Boy's Girlish Wife is Heartbroken by Their Separation." The article also shows a picture of her.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks triansanderrors for the link to this great story about the young newlyweds.

comment._content: So sweet, I wonder if they ever got together again.
